short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get more done in Salesforce - Quickly access any page using your keyboard!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you get to any Salesforce page quickly. Just type in what you need to do!

For example, 
  Instead of Navigating to Object Manager -> Accounts -> Triggers --> "myAccountTrigger",   Enter "Account Triggers <TAB> myAcc" and access that trigger directly.
  
  Instead of Navigating to Setup -> Users -> Permission Sets -> My Permission set,  Enter "Permis Set <TAB> my" and access it directly.
  
To use:  
- Press Ctrl-Shift-Space to open the Commander bar
- Enter "List [Object] <Enter>" to get to the object list.
- Enter "List [Object] <Tab>" to see the the available listviews for this object, and choose one.
- Enter "Setup [Object] fields <Tab> " to see the list of fields, and choose one using arrow keys+Enter or mouse.
- Enter "Users <Tab> [partial name]" to see the user's page.

More examples available in the README in https://github.com/uris-tools/Salesforce-Commander
